TopicTitle: Crash when trying to start game.

Articles.Content:
Game Version: KSP 0.90.0

Description: The game crashes during start up.

Possibly related: The game ignores the window size setting and tries to run in 1920x1080 despite being set to 1280x1024

System Details:

OS: Windows XP Home SP3

RAM: 4GB (3.5gb available due to 32bit system)

Graphics: nVidia GTS 250.

Crash folder created by game when it crashes: http://www./download/nb2gyqed78cqgep/2014-12-16_135040.7z

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Trying to allocate: 22369620B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete

Allocation happend at: Line:0 in Overloaded New[]

Memory overview

[ ALLOC_DEFAULT ] used: 256170185B | peak: 0B | reserved: 267548368B

[ ALLOC_GFX ] used: 131825471B | peak: 0B | reserved: 159638172B

[ ALLOC_CACHEOBJECTS ] used: 222888B | peak: 0B | reserved: 12582912B

[ ALLOC_TYPETREE ] used: 0B | peak: 0B | reserved: 0B

[ ALLOC_PROFILER ] used: 117936B | peak: 0B | reserved: 8388608B

Could not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Looks like you are running out of memory.

That's exactly the issue.

Self-help thread says the game needs 2GB with 4GB recommended. I've got a total of 3.5gb accessible.

If it helps, all previous versions of the game have run perfectly fine on my system. This is the first one that hasn't.
If it generated a settings.cfg, reduce the texture quality there. If it didn't, try to free up some more RAM.
Also, are you using Windows XP 32-bit or 64-bit? Programs on 32-bit Windows are limited to 2 GB, not 3.5 GB Ã¢â‚¬â€œ that's for 32-bit programs on 64-bit Windows.

32bit Windows XP.

I've already lowered the graphics quality right down. Makes no difference, the game still crashes.

Also kinda annoying that the game is ignoring the settings.cfg screen resolution settings, as that makes me wonder what else in the file the game is ignoring.

I am also having issues with the game crashing within 45 seconds after main menu loads.clean install no mods on my 3930k, 16gb, win7-64bit, gtx780ti. Im not getting any error messages. It worked fine until I updated to beta via Steam. Very dissapointing because it is an awesome game.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Claw
I too am crashing about 45 seconds into the load. Clean install, raised Virtual Memory, no mods installed at all. Never had an issue until the update. Please help.

Kerbonauts,

It's very hard to help diagnose your problems if you don't provide more information. Please see this link, which explains where to find the log files. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Thanks,

~Claw

My game also crashes running a completely stock install (removed ksp folder and did new Steam install for 0.90). I click the executable (either 32 bit or 64 bit) and it goes to a white screen for approximately 7 seconds and then I get a crash error.

Details:

build id = 00705

2014-12-15_13-42-05

Branch: master

Link to Error Logs:

http://www./download/yo974es4ppd5873/2014-12-16_143922.zip

Link to System dxdiag:

http://www./view/qjfaffiv20p8v24/DxDiag.txt

Previously played version .25 without serious problems (just memory issues like everyone else running many mods).
Just verified the files on Steam - reported several thousand files with errors. I've never had a problem with Steam downloads before. Hopefully re-downloading will solve the start-up crash.
Runs well after repairing / replacing damaged files via Steam. Pity the error reports on crash weren't clearer.

Also crashing for me every time I try to load. Approximately halfway through the initial file load.

Had no issues with previous versions. Was so excited about the beta but now can't play at all.

Error files are here...

https://www./folder/smlb4pyrz1axn3r,2jtdjq0ovus6r5c,ysuau0az6xyg42j/shared

Please help :/

EDIT: Solved. Changed texture quality setting to 1 in cfg file. Up and running again!

Edited December 16, 2014 by Grug

I too am having this issue. I did not purchase mine through steam though. I got in on ground level and now this game is completely broken. Game comes up to launcher screen. I have changed settings to low and the game does not launch at all. What gives?

I too am having this issue.

zipster911,

Please review this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

We will need some more details in order to try and figure out what your problem might be.

Cheers,

~Claw
